title: cannot create admin user on centos
body:
**expected result**
able to create admin user and login for first time

**acutal result**
error message: 

"mysql username and/or password not valid 
you need to enter either an existing account or the administrator."



**steps**
install owncloud on centos6 with the following packages installed:
php-gd    php-cli     php-mbstring    php    php-ldap    php-xml
php-common    php-mysql    php-pdo    php-intl


php version is 5.3.3  (also tried php 5.4)

attempt to log in and cannot create database.  get error mentioned above.

**notes**
1) attempted to use remote mysql database which works fine with ubuntu instances of owncloud -- used same username and password as i use for ubuntu -- cannot connect.

2) attempted to install mysql-server on the localhost and create owncloud database with privileges granted to a userid.  cannot connect.

3) am able to log into both instances of mysql from the centos command line with the same credentials being used for owncloud

**logs**
httpd access and error logs show nothing
owncloud logs are not created at all
